job.title: Equipment Data Analyst
job.description: ltstronggtCustomer First  Integrity  Excellence  Teamwork  Fun ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAt Peterson our Vision is to be our ltstronggt customers first choice ltstronggt We put our customers first and continually strengthen our partnerships through our employees hard work ingenuity and determination Our 85 year history is a reflection of our collective efforts and focusltbrgtltbrgtWe provide a family oriented environment that promotes safety personal growth and professional achievement Critical to our continued success is ltstronggt hiring and developing exceptional employees ltstronggt We are deeply committed to providing an environment necessary to attract and retain engaged employees who will relentlessly strive to reach Petersons strategic goals and vision We have high standards for our employees with good reason They represent Peterson our family our brand and our values to customers and our team membersltbrgtltbrgtWhy PetersonltbrgtltbrgtWe have high expectations and so do you ltstronggt You are exceptionally motivated have outstanding skills and are looking for more than just a job ltstronggt We offer competitive wages generous benefits and promotional opportunities at a family owned and operated business that really cares about employees If you want to work sidebyside with others who are passionate about customer service consider joining our team You can help us write more chapters in our success story as we move towards celebrating our 100 year anniversaryltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtPeterson Cat has an immediate need for an Equipment Data Analyst located at our San Leandro CA location ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltugtSummaryltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThe person in the position organizes and performs MachinesEngines InventoryPopulation data cleanup and maintenance in DBSOLGAEDCRM for all Peterson CAT locations CA and OR Responsible to review and perform monthly cleanup and update duties for all DBSOLGAEDCRM DealerBusiness Systems  Opportunity Lead Generation Analyzer  Equipment Data specific system maintenance and reports Responsible to update customers MachinesEngines population records as requested by Product Support Reps MachinesEngines Salesman and Sales Managers and other Peterson CAT employees as defined by the Product Support Analytics ampamp Program ManagerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtEssential Job FunctionsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThe following reflects managements definition of essential functions for this job but does not restrict the tasks that may be assigned Management may assign or reassign the functions to this job at any time due to reasonable accommodation or other reasons Job functions include the following Other duties may be assignedltbrgtltulgtltligtWorks under the direction of the Product Support Analytics ampamp Program Manager to perform duties in cleaning up and maintaining Customers Equipment Population records MachinesEngines with valid and accurate dataltligtltligtCommunicates on a dailyweekly basis with Product Support Analytics ampamp Program Manager to resolve issues or problems related to Machines and Engines Customers inventorypopulation record accuracy and updates and on a monthly CAT nonCAT T200 for customers and machinesltligtltligtPrepare and create analysisreports presentation graphs and other analysis report on OLGA and COGNOS including Opportunity Sales Lost Opportunities Knowledge and working experience with Microsoft Office ExcelWordPowerPoint programs is a requirementltbrgtltbrgtPeterson Holding Company is committed to equal employment opportunity and affirmative
